<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Plumbing Apprentice]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
Check out our reviews and videos online!
  
 
  
 
  
 
  
About Us:
  
 
  
For over 29 Years, we’ve been providing the highest quality, efficiency and reliability when it comes to serving customers in residential service and installation. We take pride in completing our work down to the very last detail. The highest level of service and workmanship is what keeps us moving. Learn how our management, office staff and technicians can help you become more successful and excel in your trade. Raise your level of service and be part of a team environment- you’re not alone!
  
 
  
 
  
 
  
About You:
  
 
  
You work hard. You love helping people. You want to create opportunities for your life and are seeking a better work culture. You want to have a career with a growing company where you don't have to look for a job ever again.
  
 
  
 
  
 
  
 Job Description:  - Arrive early to help technicians stock vehicles, unload previous days material  - Organize stock and tools in the shop  - Continued cleanliness of the warehouse space  - Receive orders  - Organize orders with proper PO and to be organized for pick up for drop off  - Drop off of project orders and material to job sites  - Help technicians clean up job sites  - Handle order returns 
  
 
  
   
  
 
  
 Job Requirements:  - Great work ethic 
  
 
  
 -  Must pass drug test, background check, and have a clean driving record 
  
 
  
 - Punctuality 
  
 
  
 - High energy  - An understanding of basic fittings, tools and material, basic handy skills such as measuring and cutting are preferred

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Electrical Coordinator]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[Electrical Coordinator 
  
 About Us: 
  
 
  
 128 Plumbing, Heating, Cooling & Electric  is a growing service and installation company that has been in business for  29 years  now. 
  
 
  
 We're looking for a hardworking, quick-thinking, passionate person to fit our team's positive culture in our office and raise the bar for our incredible techs. The highest level of service and workmanship is what keeps us moving. Please check out our website, Facebook and Instagram pages, and Youtube videos to see if this would be the right company for you. 
  
 
  
   
  
 
  
 About Your Role as the Electrical Coordinator: 
  
 
  
 As   an  Electrical Coordinator  ,  your primary focus is managin g the departments day-to-day and building upon its success. Fielding calls, scheduling, following up with customers and field teammates, and ensuring all parts and material are available to complete the scope of work in a timely manner are top priorities for you and your team. You are the quarterback of daily success and rapport with the field staff is the number one priority.   
  
 
  
   
  
 
  
 Requirements for the Electrical Coordinator: 
  
 
  
 
  
+  No experience in HVAC, Plumbing or Electrical is required 
  
 
  
+  Multitasking and quick-thinking 
  
 
  
+  Sufficient computer aptitude 
  
 
  
+  Ability to lead and mentor others 
  
 
  
+  Management/scheduling experience 
  
 
  
+  Attention to detail 
  
 
  
+  Keep organization as a priority 
  
 
  
+ Proficient typing and computer skills 
  
 
  
 
  
 Responsibilities  for the Electrical Coordinator: 
  
 
  
 
  
+  Demonstrate awareness of daily, weekly, and monthly success metrics 
  
 
  
+  Drive performance consistently within the department 
  
 
  
+  Assist the Service Manager 
  
 
  
+  Consistently communicate with the Customer Service team through proper channels to meet daily call goals 
  
 
  
+  Ability to schedule strategically to reach goals consistently 
  
 
  
+  Ensure that all information is properly obtained, tasks and invoices are accurate, proper payment is collected, and notes are placed within each call 
  
 
  
+  Utilize and manage the on-call rotation schedule 
  
 
  
+  Provide support for the field staff during any scheduled visits 
  
 
  
+  Ensure invoice summaries are complete and accurate 
  
 
  
+  Understand and demonstrate the ability to uphold all operational policies and procedures for daily dispatching 
  
 
  
+  Understand how to properly calculate drive time and logistics 
  
 
  
+  React quickly and efficiently to keep customers informed of any changes to the schedule that may affect them 
  
 
  
+  Confirm appointments for the next day to ensure call capacity 
  
 
  
+  Obtain, process, and verify payments for pending projects and completed work 
  
 
  
+  Obtain, process, and verify customer signatures and authorization for pending projects and completed work 
  
 
  
+  Assist in sending invoices to customers for invoicing/estimates/other needs 
  
 
  
+  Understand the skill levels needed for each job and properly match that to the customers wants and needs  
  
 
  
+  Ensure EOD audit is executed properly at the end of each business day 
  
 
  
+  Understand the dispatcher’s duties, and hop in with help whenever necessary 
  
 
  
 
  
    Benefits  for the Electrical Coordinator: 
  
 
  
 
  
+  A+ Team Environment 
  
 
  
+  Paid Holidays 
  
 
  
+  Paid Vacation, Personal, and Sick Time 
  
 
  
+  Paid Training and Education 
  
 
  
+  Company Events 
  
 
  
+  Health, Vision, and Dental Insurance 
  
 
  
+  401k Retirement Plan with 4% IRA Matching

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[HVAC Maintenance Technician]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
 About us: 
  
 
  
 For over 29 Years, we’ve been providing the highest quality, efficiency and reliability when it comes to serving customers in residential service and installation. We take pride in completing our work down to the very last detail. The highest level of service and workmanship is what keeps us moving. Learn how our management, office staff and technicians can help you become more successful and excel in your trade. Raise your level of service and be part of a team environment- you’re not alone! 
  
 
  
   
  
 
  
 About You: 
  
 
  
 You work hard. You love helping people. You want to create opportunities for your life and are seeking a better work culture. You want to have a career with a growing company where you don't have to look for a job ever again. 
  
 
  
   
  
 
  
 Responsibilities for the HVAC Maintenance Technician: 
  
 
  
 
  
+  Demonstrate the core values every single day: Service, Teamwork, and Development 
  
 
  
+  Strive for nothing below a 5-Star Customer Experience on every call 
  
 
  
+  Arrive on time and well-groomed 
  
 
  
+  Complete all calls efficiently, provide a premium maintenance and educate customers 
  
 
  
+  Show yourself as a knowledgeable professional when providing options on repair and replacement 
  
 
  
+  Assist customers in choosing maintenance plans and financing options 
  
 
  
+  Work alongside the dispatcher and project managers to ensure overall success of the business 
  
 
  
+  Maintain your truck with stocked inventory 
  
 
  
+  Participate actively in all trainings and morning meetings 
  
 
  
+  Be accurate and timely with invoices, time cards, feedback, and option sheets 
  
 
  
 
  
 Qualifications for the HVAC Maintenance Technician : 
  
 
  
 
  
+  Must be mechanically inclined 
  
 
  
+  Must have passion for exceptional service 
  
 
  
+  Must enjoy serving and helping others 
  
 
  
+  Must have pride in workmanship 
  
 
  
+  Must pass drug test, background check, and have a clean driving record 
  
 
  
+  Must have 3 years of experience 
  
 
  
+  Must have excellent communication skills 
  
 
  
+  Must be team oriented as well as work independently 
  
 
  
+  Must be available for on-call rotation 
  
 
  
 
  
 Benefits for the HVAC Maintenance Technician: 
  
 
  
 
  
+  A+ Team Environment 
  
 
  
+  Earn Weekly Bonuses 
  
 
  
+  Paid Holidays 
  
 
  
+  Paid Vacation, Personal, and Sick Time 
  
 
  
+  Paid Training and Education 
  
 
  
+  Guaranteed Year-Round Work (No Seasonal Layoff) 
  
 
  
+  Company Vehicle Fully Stocked 
  
 
  
+  Company iPhone 
  
 
  
+  Company iPad 
  
 
  
+  Company Events 
  
 
  
+  Fitted and Customized Company Uniforms 
  
 
  
+  Team and Management Support At All Times 
  
 
  
+  Health, Vision, and Dental In
